SELECT DATE_FORMAT(salesTime,'%Y-%m') timeByYear, SUM(number) AS numberByYear, goodsId FROM bus_sales WHERE salesTime>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND goodsId = #{goodsId} GROUP BY timeByYear
SELECT SUM(bs.number) AS value, gs.goodsName AS name FROM bus_sales bs LEFT JOIN bus_goods gs ON bs.goodsId = gs.id WHERE YEAR(salesTime)=YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY bs.goodsId
